input.sentences: i decided to take a short road trip
there was a lot of construction .
there was also some great art on the sides of the road .
some of the art was just grafitti | though .
output.sentences: We took a trip up a short hill and down the road a few miles.
Eventually we came to this rural location.
There was a large lot with construction.
Behind the lot and down the road was magnificent art.
The graffiti place here by local artist has created an influx of art in the community.
